name: APO-DZ for Android
tagline: Android application for Alpha Phi Omega's Delta Zeta Chapter.
body:
#  APO-DZ
Our Android app interfaces with our Google Calendars and multiple Google spreadsheets as a native mobile interface for service project signup, event viewing, our chapter directories, and the reporting forms we use to run our infrastructure.

## Download
[![Get it on Google Play](http://developer.android.com/images/brand/en_generic_rgb_wo_45.png)](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=org.upennapo.app) 
[![Get it on the App Store](https://linkmaker.itunes.apple.com/htmlResources/assets/en_us//images/web/linkmaker/badge_appstore-lrg.svg)](https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/apo-dz/id862246150?mt=8&uo=4)

The source code is available at [our repository](https://github.com/ronaldsmartin/APO-DZ-Android).

## Support or Contact
Please report any bugs or feature recommendations to the [App Suggestion Box](https://docs.google.com/forms/d/1TvicaFVBNcVgoZbTqXt3YvzY_ds2L0qHhz2LDpi6wDQ/viewform).

You can contact us at developer@upennapo.org with any other questions or concerns. We are especially happy to help brothers from other chapters set up the infrastructure they need to produce similar apps. More information on building your own version can be found in the [app wiki](https://github.com/ronaldsmartin/APO-DZ-Android/wiki).

## Authors and Contributors
[Ronald Martin](@ronaldsmartin) and [Dean Wilhelmi](@turniphead) started building this at [Pennapps 2014](http://2014s.pennapps.com/) with contributions from [Han Loh](@lianhanloh). It has since taken on a life of its own!

Thank you to Daniela Lissandrello and Nikila Dandapani for their graphic design work and to Jackie Chow for her endless support.

### About our Chapter
The Delta Zeta chapter is based at the University of Pennsylvania. Please visit [our website](upennapo.org) for more information.

## Privacy
None of your personal information leaves your phone. Ever.
